chapters.title: Introduction & Guest Speakers
chapters.summary: The episode begins with an introduction of the hosts and guest speakers – Brittany Rosario, Andrew Buffet, and Jesse Prut – and highlights their affiliations with the Dell Web School Construction and ASU.

chapters.title: Dell Web School & Recruitment Goals
chapters.summary: The speakers outline the Dell Web School’s mission to help students secure their first job and emphasize the requirement of two internships for graduation, setting the stage for the episode’s focus.

chapters.title: Importance of the Resume
chapters.summary: Brittany Rosario emphasizes the critical role of a well-crafted resume as the first point of contact with potential employers, highlighting the limited time recruiters have to review resumes.

chapters.title: Resume Content & Relevance
chapters.summary: Brittany discusses the importance of focusing on relevant skills and technologies on a resume, advising students to prioritize relatable information and avoid overwhelming recruiters with a long list of skills.

chapters.title: High School Experience & GPA
chapters.summary: The conversation shifts to whether high school experience and GPA should be included on a resume, particularly for incoming freshmen, with Andrew and Brittany offering guidance on what to include based on a student's background.
